page.title: 01Edenthorpe area survey 1985
page.content: This block is developing as a residential area with the growth of several small industrial estates as well. In the southern part of the Block is the mining community of{ {Armthorpe} with the pit itself - Markham Main - just outside the Block. {Edenthorpe}and{Kirk Sandall}in the north of the Block are mainly residen- tial. The{River Don}crosses part of the area. The glass firms of Pilkingtons and Rockware are both found in the area. There are two comprehensive secondary schools: Hungerhill serves the northern and Armthorpe the southern part of the Block. The link road to the nearby{M18 crosses the area. Despite the many developments taking place the area still retains an agricultural atmosphere in a few places.
